skill.name: x-article-publisher
skill.description: Publish Markdown articles to X (Twitter) Articles editor with proper formatting. Use when user wants to publish a Markdown file/URL to X Articles, or mentions "publish to X", "post article to Twitter", "X article", or wants help with X Premium article publishing. Handles cover image upload and converts Markdown to rich text automatically.
skill.summary: Publish Markdown articles to X (Twitter) Articles editor with proper formatting. Use when user wants...
skill.author: wshuyi

security_audit.summary: This skill contains two Python scripts for Markdown parsing and clipboard operations. Both scripts only access files explicitly specified as command-line arguments. No network calls, environment variable access, or code execution capabilities. The browser automation uses documented X.com endpoints only. Low risk due to controlled, minimal file operations.

content.value_statement: Publishing long-form content to X Articles requires manual formatting and image positioning. This skill parses Markdown files, converts them to rich text HTML, and automates the publishing workflow with precise image placement.
actual_capabilities: Parse Markdown files and extract title, cover image, and content images
Convert Markdown to HTML with rich text formatting (headers, bold, links, lists)
Copy HTML and images to system clipboard for pasting
Automate browser navigation to X Articles editor
Insert images at precise positions using block index positioning
Save articles as drafts for manual review
limitations: Requires X Premium Plus subscription for Articles feature
Only works with local Markdown files (no remote URL parsing)
Browser automation requires logged-in user session

output: ✓ Parsed article.md - Title: Getting Started with Python

best_practices: Always save as draft and review before publishing
Use block index positioning for accurate image placement
Insert images in reverse order (highest block_index first)
anti_patterns: Do not use text matching for image positioning
Do not skip the draft review step
Do not assume the editor is open before clicking create

faq.question: Does this work on Windows or Linux?
faq.answer: Browser automation works on all platforms but clipboard scripts require macOS for AppKit integration.

faq.question: What Markdown features are supported?
faq.answer: H2/H3 headers, bold, italic, links, lists, blockquotes, and images. Code blocks convert to blockquotes.

faq.question: Can I publish directly without review?
faq.answer: The skill always saves as draft by design to prevent accidental publishing. Review before clicking publish.

faq.question: How are images positioned?
faq.answer: Images use block index positioning, not text matching. Each image is inserted after the block at its specified index.

faq.question: Does this access my X account?
faq.answer: The skill navigates to x.com but you must be logged in. No credentials are stored or accessed.

faq.question: How is this different from copying manually?
faq.answer: The skill handles Markdown parsing, HTML conversion, precise image placement, and workflow automation automatically.
